channel.title: How to change name of server and make a server notice
channel.description: im confused on how to change the name of my server. i want to change all of them like in the game when it says welcome to project warfarev2 and the loading screen. my source and client is project warfarev2. i have changed the names in client.java and config.java but it doesnt appear in the game after i compile it. also how do i make/change the server notice and make it so i can just type it kind of like a yell thing. some1 help?

item.title: How to change name of server and make a server notice
item.dc:creator: @Ibanezz Ibanezz
item.description:
@Ibanezz wrote:

there isnt an announcements thing when i open it up and wait so what do i do for the name? :eek: oh and it just has something weird that idk what it does… it says “2652 9999 - Fremmy Maze”

Read full topic
item.source: How to change name of server and make a server notice

item.title: How to change name of server and make a server notice
item.dc:creator: @justinleeoglesby justinleeoglesby
item.description:
@justinleeoglesby wrote:

renaming your server file to something other than project warfarev2 and then searching will help and im going to guess its project insanity based since it has the word project in it but for the server notice thing there “might” be a file when u first open server file that is named announcements.ini tell me if there isnt.

Read full topic
